title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
**Advertising Description:**

Bring the magical Christmas spirit into your home or outdoor space with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. This stunning decoration features a generously sized 23.6inch Pre-Lit Wreath, accompanied by an enchanting 8.8feet long garland - perfect for enhancing your holiday décor.

Our Wreath & Garland Set boasts an impressive array of decorative elements, including snowflake pine needle branches, 2 types of beautiful pine cones, luscious berry clusters, and elegant frosted branches. Each piece has been thoughtfully crafted from high-quality materials, ensuring a sturdy, long-lasting, and maintenance-free addition to your Christmas celebrations.

The garland's 100 warm LED lights add a gentle, inviting glow to any space - ideal for creating a cozy ambiance in your living room, bedroom, dining room, or even on your windows. With a simple battery operation (3 AA batteries not included), you can enjoy the twinkling magic of this set both indoors and outdoors.

The timer function offers 6 hours on and 18 hours off, allowing you to effortlessly manage your lighting display without any hassle. The hypoallergenic, fireproof materials used in crafting our decorations guarantee a safe and enjoyable experience for all. Plus, with a full 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service availability, you can shop with complete peace of mind.

Experience the beauty and versatility of our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set - the perfect centerpiece for your holiday décor this season.

**Advertisement:**

Bring the magic of Christmas into your home or outdoor space with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This stunning decorative piece includes a beautiful 23.6 inch pre-lit wreath and an extended 8.8 feet garland, adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, 2 types of pine cones, luscious berry clusters, and enchanting frosted branches.

Light up your holiday spirit with our warm LED lights, featuring a count of 100, for a truly mesmerizing display. Our batteries-operated lights (3 AA batteries not included) come equipped with a convenient timer function that turns on the lights for 6 hours and off for 18 hours to save energy and add to the ambiance.

Crafted from high-quality materials, our wreath and garland set boasts sturdy construction, ensuring long-lasting durability, and is both hypoallergenic and fireproof for your peace of mind. This maintenance-free decoration never requires water or fading worries – making it perfect for those with busy lifestyles or allergies.

Our versatile set can be used indoor or outdoor, enhancing the look of walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows. Plus, with a 365-day warranty and our dedicated customer service team available 24 hours a day, you can shop with confidence knowing your purchase is backed by top-notch quality and support. Make this holiday season one to remember – order now!

Crafted from high-quality, sturdy, hypoallergenic, and fireproof materials, this set is designed to last a lifetime without any need for maintenance or water. Decorate your walls, doors, windows, living room, bedroom, dining room, fireplace, or any other suitable location with confidence, knowing that these decorations will never fade or lose their vibrant colors.

Experience the joy and peace of mind that comes with our exceptional after-sales service, including a 365-day warranty and expert customer support available 24 hours a day. Make your Christmas truly unforgettable with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set – order yours today!
